inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AzureActivity
| where ResourceProvider == "Microsoft SQL"
| summarize by OperationName

content.Query:
AzureActivity
| where ResourceProvider == "Microsoft SQL"
| where ActivityStatus <> "Failed" and ActivityStatus <> "Accepted"
| summarize count() by OperationName, Caller
| sort by OperationName
content.PartTitle: Azure Portal Activity for SQL Databases

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == 'SQLSecurityAuditEvents'
| where action_name_s has "DATABASE AUTHENTICATION FAILED"
| parse additional_information_s with * "error_code>" Error_Code "<" *
| parse additional_information_s with * "error_state>" Error_State "<" *
| extend Reason=case(Error_Code == 40615, "IP Blocked by Firewall", Error_Code == 18456, "Bad Password/Username", Error_Code)
| where Error_Code != 40615
| summarize count() by session_server_principal_name_s, client_ip_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)

content.Query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == 'SQLSecurityAuditEvents'
| where action_name_s has "DATABASE AUTHENTICATION FAILED"
| parse additional_information_s with * "error_code>" Error_Code "<" *
| parse additional_information_s with * "error_state>" Error_State "<" *
//| extend Reason=case(Error_Code == 40615, "IP Blocked by Firewall", Error_Code == 18456, "Bad Password/Username", Error_Code)
| where Error_Code == 18456
| summarize count() by session_server_principal_name_s, client_ip_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == 'SQLSecurityAuditEvents'
| summarize count() by LogicalServerName_s, database_name_s
| summarize Logging_Databases=count(database_name_s)

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == 'SQLSecurityAuditEvents'
| where action_name_s has "DATABASE AUTHENTICATION FAILED"
| summarize count() by session_server_principal_name_s, client_ip_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == 'SQLSecurityAuditEvents'
|summarize count() by client_ip_s

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == 'SQLSecurityAuditEvents'
| where action_name_s has "DATABASE AUTHENTICATION"
| summarize by LogicalServerName_s, database_name_s, host_name_s, session_server_principal_name_s, client_ip_s, action_name_s

content.Query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == 'SQLSecurityAuditEvents'
| where action_name_s has "DATABASE AUTHENTICATION"
| parse additional_information_s with * "error_code>" Error_Code "<" *
| parse additional_information_s with * "error_state>" Error_State "<" *
| extend Reason=case(Error_Code == 40615, "IP Blocked by Firewall", Error_Code == 18456, "Bad Password/Username", Error_Code == 47073, "Public Network Access Denied", Error_Code)
| summarize count() by ResourceGroup, LogicalServerName_s, database_name_s, username_entered=session_server_principal_name_s, client_hostname=host_name_s, client_ip_s, action_name_s, Reason

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let a = AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == 'SQLSecurityAuditEvents'
| where action_name_s has "DATABASE AUTHENTICATION FAILED"
| summarize count() by session_server_principal_name_s, client_ip_s
| sort by count_;
let b =AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == 'SQLSecurityAuditEvents'
| where action_name_s has "DATABASE AUTHENTICATION SUCCEEDED"
| summarize count() by session_server_principal_name_s, client_ip_s
| sort by count_;
a | join kind=fullouter b on client_ip_s
| project User=iff(isempty(session_server_principal_name_s), session_server_principal_name_s1, session_server_principal_name_s),
          IP=iff(isempty(client_ip_s), client_ip_s1, client_ip_s),
          Failed=count_,
          Succeeded=count_1
| sort by Failed

content.Query:
let a = AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == 'SQLSecurityAuditEvents'
| where action_name_s has "DATABASE AUTHENTICATION FAILED"
| summarize count() by session_server_principal_name_s, client_ip_s
| sort by count_;
let b =AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == 'SQLSecurityAuditEvents'
| where action_name_s has "DATABASE AUTHENTICATION SUCCEEDED"
| summarize count() by session_server_principal_name_s, client_ip_s
| sort by count_;
a | join kind=fullouter b on client_ip_s
| project Username_Entered=iff(isempty(session_server_principal_name_s), session_server_principal_name_s1, session_server_principal_name_s),
          IP=iff(isempty(client_ip_s), client_ip_s1, client_ip_s),
          Failed=count_,
          Succeeded=count_1
| sort by Failed
content.PartTitle: Logon Attempts by User Name and User IP

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == 'SQLSecurityAuditEvents'
| summarize by LogicalServerName_s, database_name_s, statement_s, application_name_s, host_name_s, session_server_principal_name_s, client_ip_s, action_name_s
| where isnotempty(statement_s)

content.Query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == 'SQLSecurityAuditEvents'
| project TimeGenerated, statement_s, LogicalServerName_s, database_name_s, application_name_s, host_name_s, session_server_principal_name_s, client_ip_s, action_name_s
| where isnotempty(statement_s)

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == 'SQLSecurityAuditEvents'
| summarize count() by LogicalServerName_s, database_name_s
| sort by count_

content.Query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == 'SQLSecurityAuditEvents'
| summarize count() by LogicalServerName_s, database_name_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| sort by count_

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
Event
| where Source contains "SQL"
| summarize Logging_Servers=dcount(Computer)

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
Event
| where Source has "SQL"
| where EventLevelName <> "Information"
| summarize count(EventLevelName) by Computer, EventLevelName

content.Query:
Event
| where Source contains "SQL"
| where EventLevelName <> "Information" and EventLevelName <> "Audit Success"
| summarize count(EventLevelName) by Computer, EventLevelName
| sort by count_EventLevelName
content.PartTitle: Count of Errors and Warnings by Server

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
Event
| where Source has "SQL"
| where Source == "SQL_Query"
| summarize by TimeGenerated, Computer, UserName, ["Query Executed"]=RenderedDescription

content.Query:
Event
| where Source contains "SQL"
| where Source == "SQL_Query"
| summarize by TimeGenerated, Computer, UserName, ["Query Executed"]=RenderedDescription

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
Event
| where Source has "SQL"
| summarize Count=count() by EventLevelName

content.Query:
Event
| where Source contains "" "SQL"
| summarize Count=count() by EventLevelName

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
Event
| where Source contains "SQL"
| where RenderedDescription startswith "Login failed"
| where UserName !startswith "NT " and UserName !contains "$" and UserName != "N/A"
| summarize count() by UserName, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
Event
| where Source has "SQL"
| summarize Count=count() by Computer
| sort by Count

content.Query:
Event
| where Source contains "SQL"
| summarize Count=count() by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| sort by Count

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
Event
| where Source contains "SQL"
| where RenderedDescription startswith "Login"
| parse RenderedDescription with * "Login " Authentication "for user '" User "'. " Detail ". [CLIENT: " UserIP "]" *
| summarize count() by Computer, UserName, Authentication, UserIP, Detail
| sort by count_

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
Event
| where Source contains "SQL"
| where RenderedDescription startswith "Login Failed for user"
| parse RenderedDescription with * "user '" User "'. Reason:" Reason ". [CLIENT: " UserIP "]" *
| where Reason == " Could not find a login matching the name provided"
| summarize count() by UserName, UserIP, Reason
| sort by count_

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let a = Event
| where Source contains "SQL"
| where RenderedDescription startswith "Login failed"
| summarize count() by UserName;
let b = Event
| where Source contains "SQL"
| where RenderedDescription startswith "Login succeeded"
| summarize count() by UserName;
a | join kind=fullouter b on UserName
| project User=iff(isempty(UserName), UserName1, UserName),
          Failed=count_,
          Succeeded=count_1
| sort by Failed
